text: Lewinella persica is a bacterium from the genus of Lewinella which has been isolated from mud from Galway in Ireland. 0 == References == == Further reading == * * ==External links== *Type strain of Lewinella persica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingobacteriia Category:Bacteria described in 1970
title: Lewinella persica
